code: import React,{Fragment,useRef}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import{CreatePasswordRequest}from'../../API/APIRequest';import{getEmail,getOTP}from'../../helper/SessionHelper';import{IsEmpty}from'../helper/Delete/FormHelper/FormHelper';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CreatePassword=function CreatePassword(){var navigate=useNavigate();var passRef,confirmPassRef=useRef();var email=getEmail();var otp=getOTP();var onSubmit=function onSubmit(){var pass=passRef.value;var conf=confirmPassRef.value;console.log(pass,conf);if(IsEmpty(pass)){toast.error('Password required',{position:"bottom-center"});}else if(IsEmpty(conf)){toast.error('Password Confirm required',{position:"bottom-center"});}else if(pass!==conf){toast.error('Password & Confirm Password Must same required',{position:"bottom-center"});}else{CreatePasswordRequest(email,otp,pass).then(function(result){if(result===true){navigate('/');}});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login__wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"login__form__wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login__form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Create New Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login__field",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{defaultValue:email,type:"text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:function ref(input){return passRef=input;},type:"text",placeholder:"New Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{ref:function ref(input){return confirmPassRef=input;},type:"text",placeholder:"Confirmed Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onClick:onSubmit,className:"login__btn",type:"button",value:"Next"})]})]})})})});};export default CreatePassword;
